content.paragraph1: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit our website. They help us provide you with a better experience by remembering your preferences and understanding how you use our service.
content.paragraph2: This Cookie Policy explains how PayMatch uses cookies and similar technologies when you visit our website or use our services.

essential.title: 2.1 Essential Cookies
essential.content: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly. They enable basic functions like page navigation and access to secure areas of the website.

analytics.title: 2.2 Analytics Cookies
analytics.content: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously.

marketing.title: 2.3 Marketing Cookies
marketing.content: These cookies are used to track visitors across websites to display relevant and engaging advertisements.

sessionCookies.title: 3.1 Session Cookies
sessionCookies.content: We use session cookies to maintain your login state and remember your preferences during your visit.

persistentCookies.title: 3.2 Persistent Cookies
persistentCookies.content: We use persistent cookies to remember your preferences and settings across multiple visits.

thirdPartyCookies.title: 3.3 Third-Party Cookies
thirdPartyCookies.content: We may use third-party cookies for analytics, advertising, and other services. These are governed by the respective third parties' privacy policies.

websiteFunctionality.title: 4.1 Website Functionality
websiteFunctionality.content: To ensure our website works properly and provides you with the services you request.

userExperience.title: 4.2 User Experience
userExperience.content: To remember your preferences and provide a personalized experience.

analytics.title: 4.3 Analytics and Performance
analytics.content: To understand how our website is used and to improve its performance and functionality.

security.title: 4.4 Security
security.content: To protect against fraud and ensure the security of our services.

browserSettings.title: 5.1 Browser Settings
browserSettings.content: You can control and manage cookies through your browser settings. Most browsers allow you to refuse cookies or delete them.

ourCookieSettings.title: 5.2 Our Cookie Settings
ourCookieSettings.content: You can manage your cookie preferences through our cookie consent banner and settings panel.

optOut.title: 5.3 Opt-Out Options
optOut.content: You can opt out of certain types of cookies while keeping essential cookies that are necessary for the website to function.

analytics.title: 6.1 Analytics Services
analytics.content: We may use Google Analytics and other analytics services to understand website usage. These services may set their own cookies.

advertising.title: 6.2 Advertising Services
advertising.content: We may use advertising networks that set cookies to deliver relevant advertisements.

socialMedia.title: 6.3 Social Media
socialMedia.content: Our website may include social media features that set cookies from social media platforms.

dataRetention.title: 7. Cookie Data Retention
dataRetention.content: Different cookies have different retention periods. Session cookies are deleted when you close your browser, while persistent cookies remain on your device for a specified period or until you delete them.

consent.title: 8.1 Right to Consent
consent.content: You have the right to consent to or refuse non-essential cookies.

withdrawal.title: 8.2 Right to Withdraw Consent
withdrawal.content: You can withdraw your consent to cookies at any time by changing your browser settings or using our cookie management tools.

information.title: 8.3 Right to Information
information.content: You have the right to be informed about the cookies we use and their purposes.

updates.title: 9. Updates to This Cookie Policy
updates.content: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons.

contact.title: 10. Contact Us About Cookies
contact.content: If you have any questions about our use of cookies or this Cookie Policy, please contact us at privacy@paymatch.app or write to us at Maxapp ZRH, Birkenstrasse 49, 6343 Rotkreuz, Schweiz.
